verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees זְכוֹר־ <WH2142> ze-chor- remember יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; David אֵ֝ת <WH854> 'et behalf כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All עֻנּוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH6031> un-no-To. [and] all his afflictions

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher How נִ֭שְׁבַּע <WH7650> Nish-ba' How he sware לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD נָ֝דַ֗ר <WH5087> na-Dar, [and] vowed לַאֲבִ֥יר <WH46> la-'a-Vir unto the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. [God] of Jacob

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- I will not אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten I will not give שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8153> she-Nat sleep לְעֵינָ֑י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nai; to mine eyes לְֽעַפְעַפַּ֥י <WH6079> le-'af-'ap-Pai to mine eyelids תְּנוּמָֽה׃ <WH8572> te-nu-Mah. [or] slumber

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- Until אֶמְצָ֣א <WH4672> 'em-Tza Until I find out מָ֭קוֹם <WH4725> Ma-kom a place לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; for the LORD מִ֝שְׁכָּנ֗וֹת <WH4908> mish-ka-Not, an habitation לַאֲבִ֥יר <WH46> la-'a-Vir for the mighty יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. [God] of Jacob

הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold שְׁמַֽעֲנ֥וּהָ <WH8085> she-ma-'a-Nu-ha Lo we heard בְאֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> ve-'ef-Ra-tah; of it at Ephratah מְ֝צָאנ֗וּהָ <WH4672> me-tza-Nu-ha, we found בִּשְׂדֵי־ <WH7704> bis-dei- it in the fields יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> Ya-'ar. of the wood

נָב֥וֹאָה <WH935> na-Vo-'ah We will go לְמִשְׁכְּנוֹתָ֑יו <WH4908> le-mish-ke-no-Tav; into his tabernacles נִ֝שְׁתַּחֲוֶ֗ה <WH7812> nish-ta-cha-Veh, we will worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <WH1916> la-ha-Dom stool רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> rag-Lav. be able to endure

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> ku-Mah Arise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD לִמְנוּחָתֶ֑ךָ <WH4496> lim-nu-cha-Te-cha; into thy rest אַ֝תָּ֗ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, You וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> va-'a-Ron thou and the ark עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5797> 'uz-Ze-cha. of thy strength

כֹּהֲנֶ֥יךָ <WH3548> ko-ha-Nei-cha Let thy priests יִלְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH3847> yil-be-shu- be clothed צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; with righteousness וַחֲסִידֶ֥יךָ <WH2623> va-cha-si-Dei-cha and let thy saints יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> ye-ran-Ne-nu. shout for joy

בַּ֭עֲבוּר <WH5668> Ba-'a-vur the sake דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> da-Vid David's עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; For thy servant אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תָּ֝שֵׁ֗ב <WH7725> ta-Shev, sake turn not away פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> me-shi-Che-cha. of thine anointed

נִשְׁבַּֽע־ <WH7650> nish-ba'- hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David אֱמֶת֮ <WH571> 'e-Met [in] truth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- He will not יָשׁ֪וּב <WH7725> ya-Shuv he will not turn מִ֫מֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah at מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri from it Of the fruit בִטְנְךָ֑ <WH990> vit-ne-Cha; of thy body אָ֝שִׁ֗ית <WH7896> 'a-Shit, will I set לְכִסֵּא־ <WH3678> le-chis-se- upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- If יִשְׁמְר֬וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru will keep בָנֶ֨יךָ׀ <WH1121> va-Nei-cha If thy children בְּרִיתִי֮ <WH1285> be-ri-Ti my covenant וְעֵדֹתִ֥י <WH5713> ve-'e-do-Ti and my testimony ז֗וֹ <WH2090> zo, I אֲלַ֫מְּדֵ֥ם <WH3925> 'a-Lam-me-Dem I shall teach גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1121> be-nei-Hem them their children עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- for evermore עַ֑ד <WH5703> 'Ad; forever יֵ֝שְׁב֗וּ <WH3427> ye-she-Vu, shall also sit לְכִסֵּא־ <WH3678> le-chis-se- upon thy throne לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for בָחַ֣ר <WH977> va-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> be-tzi-Yon; Zion אִ֝וָּ֗הּ <WH183> 'iv-Vah, he hath desired לְמוֹשָׁ֥ב <WH4186> le-mo-Shav [it] for his habitation לֽוֹ׃ lo.

זֹאת־ <WH2063> zot- likewise מְנוּחָתִ֥י <WH4496> me-nu-cha-Ti This [is] my rest עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- for ever עַ֑ד <WH5703> 'Ad; forever פֹּֽה־ <WH6311> poh- Here אֵ֝שֵׁ֗ב <WH3427> 'e-Shev, here will I dwell כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִוִּתִֽיהָ׃ <WH183> 'iv-vi-Ti-ha. for I have desired

צֵ֭ידָהּ <WH6718> Tzei-dah her provision בָּרֵ֣ךְ <WH1288> ba-Rech I will abundantly אֲבָרֵ֑ךְ <WH1288> 'a-va-Rech; bless אֶ֝בְיוֹנֶ֗יהָ <WH34> ev-yo-Nei-ha, her poor אַשְׂבִּ֥יעַֽ <WH7646> 'as-Bi-a' I will satisfy לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> La-chem. with bread

וְֽ֭כֹהֲנֶיהָ <WH3548> Ve-cho-ha-nei-ha her priests אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <WH3847> 'al-Bish I will also clothe יֶ֑שַׁע <WH3468> Ye-sha'; with salvation וַ֝חֲסִידֶ֗יהָ <WH2623> va-cha-si-Dei-ha, and her saints רַנֵּ֥ן <WH7442> ran-Nen shall shout aloud יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> ye-ran-Ne-nu. aloud

שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> sham There אַצְמִ֣יחַ <WH6779> 'atz-Mi-ach to bud קֶ֣רֶן <WH7161> Ke-ren the horn לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid; of David עָרַ֥כְתִּי <WH6186> 'a-Rach-ti I have ordained נֵ֝֗ר <WH5216> Ner, a lamp לִמְשִׁיחִֽי׃ <WH4899> lim-shi-Chi. for mine anointed

א֭וֹיְבָיו <WH341> oy-vav His enemies אַלְבִּ֣ישׁ <WH3847> 'al-Bish will I clothe בֹּ֑שֶׁת <WH1322> Bo-shet; with shame וְ֝עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> ve-'a-Lav, and יָצִ֥יץ <WH6692> ya-Tzitz flourish נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> niz-Ro. but upon himself shall his crown
